abstract: James D. Farley is the third high-ranking official to leave Toyota for one of the struggling Detroit automakers in recent months.
snippet: James D. Farley is the third high-ranking official to leave Toyota for one of the struggling Detroit automakers in recent months.
lead_paragraph: DEARBORN, Mich., Oct. 11 — The Ford Motor Company said today that it had hired a top executive at Toyota, James D. Farley, to head its marketing efforts.

headline.main: Ford Names a Toyota Executive as Marketing Chief
